Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2012 06:31PM kburdic wrote: make sure you put the pet food where it is comfortable to reach - adult wipes really were the best thing in the bathroom -feeling clean made all the difference - Tedaderm on drain sites -  I had the worst issue with tape and bandages over the sites saw my BS related to one being not in place he changed me over to tegaderm bandages ( clear ones) and what a difference it helped keep them in place and no more skin irritationmforta. I bought some in walgreens and will continue to sue them what a relief. I also made myself a chair area with all needed items so I could be comfortable in to area's of the house . good luck
